title: Project: Squid Remodeled
introduction: Have you ever thought that the squid in Minecraft is a bit boring? Well, we have the solution for you! Remodeled Squid - by FishCat! have remodeled the squid to make it look more interesting and fun!
credit:
Thank you to FishCat for creating this amazing resource pack!
